preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 7 g of beryllium using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh out 1 g of silicon. 
 3. Weigh out 3 g of vanadium. 
 4. Weigh out 1 g of tungsten. 
 5. Combine all weighed ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mechanical mixer to ensure a homogeneous mixture for 10 minutes at low speed.
